    glb.cdnConfig.headerConfig = glb.cdnConfig.headerConfig || {
      brand: {link: "http://www.techtudo.com.br/"},

    glb.headerReady = true;
    glb.headerCdn = true;
    document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));

                            if ( typeof WebFontConfig === "undefined" ) {
                                WebFontConfig = new Object();
                            }
                            WebFontConfig['google'] = {families: ['Roboto:100,300,400,500,700,900,100italic,300italic,400italic,500italic,700italic,900italic', 'Noto+Serif:400,700,400italic,700italic&amp;subset=latin-ext']};

.logo{margin-top:20px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;}html,body,.post-review-text,code, kbd, pre, samp{font-family:Roboto;text-transform:none;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;-webkit-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;}.wf-loading html,body,.post-review-text,code, kbd, pre, samp,{opacity: 0;}.ie.wf-loading html,body,.post-review-text,code, kbd, pre, samp,{visibility: hidden;}h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6{font-family:"Noto Serif";text-transform:none;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;-webkit-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;}.wf-loading h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6,{opacity: 0;}.ie.wf-loading h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6,{visibility: hidden;}.widget-post h3, .tag-list li, .dropdown-menu .mega-menu-news .mega-menu-detail h4{font-family:"Noto Serif";text-transform:none;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;-webkit-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;}.wf-loading .widget-post h3, .tag-list li, .dropdown-menu .mega-menu-news .mega-menu-detail h4,{opacity: 0;}.ie.wf-loading .widget-post h3, .tag-list li, .dropdown-menu .mega-menu-news .mega-menu-detail h4,{visibility: hidden;}.featured-header h2, .page-subtitle{font-family:Roboto;text-transform:none;font-weight:900;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;-webkit-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;}.wf-loading .featured-header h2, .page-subtitle,{opacity: 0;}.ie.wf-loading .featured-header h2, .page-subtitle,{visibility: hidden;}.block-title, .comment-reply-title, .widget .nav-tabs>li>a, .wpb_heading, .widgettitle, .footer-title{font-family:Roboto;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:900;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: hidden;}.mega-menu .navbar-nav>li>a,.mm-listview a, .mega-menu .nav-tabs>li>a, .header-top .top-menu li, .mega-menu .nav, .mega-menu .collapse, .mega-menu .dropdown{font-family:Roboto;text-transform:none;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;-webkit-transition: opacity 0.24s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: opacity 0.24s .dropdown,{visibility: hidden;}body{background-color:#efefef;}.main-content, .news-details, .theiaStickySidebar{background-color:#FFFFFF;}.header-wrapper,   window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
  _taboola.push({article:'auto'});
  !function (e, f, u, i) {
    if (!document.getElementById(i)){
      e.async = 1;
      e.src = u;
      e.id = i;
      f.parentNode.insertBefore(e, f);
    }
  }(document.createElement('script'),
  document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
  '//cdn.taboola.com/libtrc/jornalciencia/loader.js',
  'tb_loader_script');
</script>

<script>(function(d, s, id) {
  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.4";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

            <div class="swiper-container" >
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          
          <div class="swiper-slide"><div class="row"><div class="col-md-8 omega">            
            <div class="featured-big">
              <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/top-15-tirinhas-que-mostram-os-medos-de-muitas-pessoas/" class="featured-href">
                <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/tirinhas-870x475.jpg" class="attachment-featured_big size-featured_big wp-post-image" alt="tirinhas" />                <div class="featured-header">
                  <span class='dt_cat bgcolor2'>Diversos</span>                  <h2 class="h1">TOP 15 tirinhas que mostram os medos de muitas pessoas</h2>
                  <p class="simple-share"><span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T17:26:50+00:00">12 minutos</time> atrás</span></p>                </div>
              </a>
            </div>
            
          </div>          <div class="col-md-4 alpha">            
            <div class="featured-small featured-top">
              <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/maior-pegada-de-dinossauro-do-mundo-e-encontrada-em-jurassic-park-da-australia/" class="featured-href">
                <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/giantdinofootprintcrop1_1024-870x415.jpg" class="attachment-featured_big size-featured_big wp-post-image" alt="giantdinofootprintcrop1_1024" />                <div class="featured-header">
                  <span class='dt_cat bgcolor3'>Meio Ambiente</span>                  <h2 class="h4">Maior pegada de dinossauro do mundo é encontrada em Jurassic Park da Austrália</h2>
                  <p class="simple-share"><span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T16:48:59+00:00">50 minutos</time> atrás</span></p>                </div>
              </a>
            </div>
            
                                
            <div class="featured-small">
              <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/ja-ouviu-falar-em-acaros-de-cilios-eles-podem-estar-vivendo-em-seu-rosto-neste-exato-momento/" class="featured-href">
                <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/acaro-de-cilios-870x500.jpg" class="attachment-featured_big size-featured_big wp-post-image" alt="acaro-de-cilios" />                <div class="featured-header">
                  <span class='dt_cat bgcolor4'>Saúde</span>                  <h2 class="h4">Já ouviu falar em ácaros de cílios? Eles podem estar vivendo em seu rosto neste exato momento</h2>
                  <p class="simple-share"><span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T16:20:34+00:00">1 hora</time> atrás</span></p>                </div>
              </a>
            </div>
            
          </div></div></div>          <div class="swiper-slide"><div class="row"><div class="col-md-8 omega">            
            <div class="featured-big">
              <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/metro-do-mexico-usa-assento-com-penis-para-conscientizar-sobre-sobre-assedio-sexual/" class="featured-href">
                <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/metro-mexico-870x500.jpg" class="attachment-featured_big size-featured_big wp-post-image" alt="metro-mexico" />                <div class="featured-header">
                  <span class='dt_cat bgcolor2'>Diversos</span>                  <h2 class="h1">Metrô do México usa assento com pênis para conscientizar sobre sobre assédio sexual</h2>
                  <p class="simple-share"><span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T15:28:56+00:00">2 horas</time> atrás</span></p>                </div>
              </a>
            </div>
            
          </div>          <div class="col-md-4 alpha">            
            <div class="featured-small featured-top">
              <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/na-busca-por-novas-terapias-cientistas-criam-embrioes-metade-humanos-metade-animais/" class="featured-href">

            </div>

</div></div></div><div class="row vc_inner row-fluid no-margin"><div class="col-md-12"><div class="wpb_wrapper">  <div class="dt-block">
        <div class="row"><div class="col-md-12"><h3 class="block-title"><span>Saúde</span></h3></div></div>    <div id="dtblockd0e2b38e0edc8f0a49ee431e024a22db"><div class="row dtmodernblock4"><div class="col-md-12">
<article class="news-block big-block post-26009 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-saude tag-ketchup tag-sodio tag-xarope-de-milho">
  <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/top-5-razoes-para-nunca-mais-comer-ketchup/" class="overlay-link">
    <figure class="image-overlay">
            <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/tomatoes-Ketchup_01-730x424.jpg" class="attachment-modern_big_thumb size-modern_big_thumb wp-post-image" alt="tomatoes-Ketchup_01" />    </figure>
  </a>
  <a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/saude/' class='dt_cat'>Saúde</a>  <header class="news-details">
    <h3 class="news-title h1">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/top-5-razoes-para-nunca-mais-comer-ketchup/">
        TOP 5 razões para nunca mais comer ketchup      </a>
    </h3>
    <p class="excerpt">Conforme nos informamos, mais nos tornamos conscientes dos problemas que acompanham o consumo de alimentos processados, uma vez que são fabricados pela adição de químicos. &nbsp; No entanto, embora se&#8230;</p>
    <p class="simple-share">de <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/author/merelin/">Merelyn Cerqueira</a></span> - <span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-08T19:36:15+00:00">3 semanas</time> atrás</span></p>  </header>
</article><!-- News block --></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript">
      /* <![CDATA[ */dt_paginated_blocks.push("dtblockd0e2b38e0edc8f0a49ee431e024a22db");dt_paginated_blocks_items.push("dtmodernblock4");dt_paginated_blocks_type.push("");/* ]]&gt; */</script>  </div>
</div></div></div>  <div class="dt-block">
            <div id="dtblockda38c863cdbc85fec79d350b11d08280"><div class="row dtmodernblock5"><div class="col-md-6">
<article class="news-block small-block post-28137 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-saude tag-embrioes tag-novas-terapias tag-quimeras">
  <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/na-busca-por-novas-terapias-cientistas-criam-embrioes-metade-humanos-metade-animais/" class="overlay-link">
    <figure class="image-overlay">
            <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/inseminaçao-laboratorio_01-540x355.jpg" class="attachment-modern_medium_thumb size-modern_medium_thumb wp-post-image" alt="inseminaçao-laboratorio_01" srcset="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/inseminaçao-laboratorio_01-540x355.jpg 540w, http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/inseminaçao-laboratorio_01-730x480.jpg 730w" sizes="(max-width: 540px) 100vw, 540px" />    </figure>
  </a>
  <a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/saude/' class='dt_cat'>Saúde</a>  <header class="news-details">

        Na busca por novas terapias, cientistas criam embriões metade humanos, metade animais      </a>
    </h3>

<article class="widget-post clearfix post-3586 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-saude tag-catarata tag-colirio tag-medico tag-oftalmologia tag-olhos tag-visao">
      <div class="simple-thumb">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/seria-o-fim-das-cirurgias-cientistas-desenvolvem-colirio-que-derrete-a-catarata-nos-olhos/">
        <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/catarata-95x80.jpg" class="attachment-text_thumb size-text_thumb wp-post-image" alt="catarata" />      </a>
    </div>
      <header>
    <h3 class="h5">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/seria-o-fim-das-cirurgias-cientistas-desenvolvem-colirio-que-derrete-a-catarata-nos-olhos/">Seria o fim das cirurgias? Cientistas desenvolvem colírio que derrete a catarata nos olhos</a>
    </h3>
    <p class="simple-share"><i class="fa fa-eye"></i> </p>  </header>
</article>

    <p class="simple-share"><span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T15:28:56+00:00">2 horas</time> atrás</span></p>  </header>
</article></div><div class="col-md-4">

</div></div></div><div class="row row-fluid"><div class="no-margin dt_content col-md-8"><div class="wpb_wrapper">  <div class="dt-block">
        <div class="row"><div class="col-md-12"><h3 class="block-title"><span>Meio Ambiente</span></h3></div></div>    <div id="dtblock48c2b6f905e2b75b2bdffb3026c8a16c"><div class="row dtmodernblock9"><div class="col-md-12">
<article class="news-block big-block post-28150 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-meio-ambiente tag-australia tag-jurassic-park tag-pegada-de-dinossauro">
  <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/maior-pegada-de-dinossauro-do-mundo-e-encontrada-em-jurassic-park-da-australia/" class="overlay-link">
    <figure class="image-overlay">
            <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/giantdinofootprintcrop1_1024-730x415.jpg" class="attachment-modern_big_thumb size-modern_big_thumb wp-post-image" alt="giantdinofootprintcrop1_1024" />    </figure>
  </a>
  <a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/meio-ambiente/' class='dt_cat'>Meio Ambiente</a>  <header class="news-details">
    <h3 class="news-title h1">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/maior-pegada-de-dinossauro-do-mundo-e-encontrada-em-jurassic-park-da-australia/">
        Maior pegada de dinossauro do mundo é encontrada em Jurassic Park da Austrália      </a>
    </h3>
    <p class="excerpt">Em um estudo publicado recentemente no The Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology, pesquisadores descreveram um impressionante achado pré-histórico. &nbsp; Em um trecho de 25 quilômetros da costa da Austrália Ocidental estão&#8230;</p>
    <p class="simple-share">de <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/author/anddy/">Anddy Queiroz</a></span> - <span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T16:48:59+00:00">50 minutos</time> atrás</span></p>  </header>
</article><!-- News block --></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript">
      /* <![CDATA[ */dt_paginated_blocks.push("dtblock48c2b6f905e2b75b2bdffb3026c8a16c");dt_paginated_blocks_items.push("dtmodernblock9");dt_paginated_blocks_type.push("");/* ]]&gt; */</script>  </div>
  <div class="dt-block">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12">
              </div>
    </div>
    <div id="dtblockfc92cc20f88469c0c7852d0736f07324"><div class="row dtsimpleblock10"><div class="col-md-12">
<article class="simple-post simple-big clearfix post-28095 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-meio-ambiente category-saude tag-agrotoxico tag-alimentos">
      <div class="simple-thumb">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/anvisa-divulga-lista-dos-vegetais-com-maiores-indices-de-contaminacao-por-agrotoxicos/">
            <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/agrotoxicos-anvisa-255x180.jpg" class="attachment-simple_big_thumb size-simple_big_thumb wp-post-image" alt="agrotoxicos-anvisa" />      </a>
    </div>
    <header>
    <p class="simple-share"><a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/meio-ambiente/' class=''>Meio Ambiente</a> / de <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/author/gustavo/">Gustavo Teixera</a></span> - <span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-28T12:04:06+00:00">6 horas</time> atrás</span></p>    <h3>
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/anvisa-divulga-lista-dos-vegetais-com-maiores-indices-de-contaminacao-por-agrotoxicos/">ANVISA divulga lista dos vegetais com maiores índices de contaminação por agrotóxicos</a>
    </h3>
    <p class="excerpt">Após os recentes escândalos envolvendo a carne, a Agência Nacional da Vigilância Sanitária, a ANVISA, divulgou uma lista que mostra quais são os alimentos com maiores índices de contaminação por&#8230;</p>
  </header>
</article></div></div><div class="row dtsimpleblock10"><div class="col-md-12">
<article class="simple-post simple-big clearfix post-28008 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-meio-ambiente category-tecnologia tag-alemanha tag-energia-renovavel tag-mina-de-carvao">
      <div class="simple-thumb">
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/alemanha-esta-transformando-mina-de-carvao-em-uma-bateria-de-energia-renovavel/">
            <img src="http://www.jornalciencia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/prosper-haniel-mine_1024-255x180.jpg" class="attachment-simple_big_thumb size-simple_big_thumb wp-post-image" alt="prosper-haniel-mine_1024" />      </a>
    </div>
    <header>
    <p class="simple-share"><a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/meio-ambiente/' class=''>Meio Ambiente</a> / de <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/author/julia-moretto/">Julia Moretto</a></span> - <span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-27T16:20:04+00:00">1 dia</time> atrás</span></p>    <h3>
      <a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/alemanha-esta-transformando-mina-de-carvao-em-uma-bateria-de-energia-renovavel/">Alemanha está transformando mina de carvão em uma bateria de energia renovável</a>
    </h3>
    <p class="excerpt">Alemanha está transformando uma de suas antigas minas de carvão em uma gigantesca &#8220;estação bateria&#8221; que armazenará energia hidroelétrica e fornecerá energia para cerca de 400 mil casas, com a&#8230;</p>
  </header>
</article></div></div><div class="row dtsimpleblock10"><div class="col-md-12">
<article class="simple-post simple-big clearfix post-27986 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-meio-ambiente tag-australia tag-cobras">

    </div>
    <header>
    <p class="simple-share"><a href='http://www.jornalciencia.com/category/meio-ambiente/' class=''>Meio Ambiente</a> / de <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/author/gustavo/">Gustavo Teixera</a></span> - <span class="article-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i> <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2017-03-27T16:17:31+00:00">1 dia</time> atrás</span></p>    <h3>

    </h3>
    <p class="excerpt">Caso esteja planejando uma viagem para Austrália, mas não goste de insetos e répteis, é preciso pensar duas vezes antes de fechar algo. Para aqueles que possuem aracnofobia, herpetofobia e&#8230;</p>
  </header>
